Module Backward Search¶

backward_search.acc_random_backward(node_list, acc_vehicle_param, dt)[source]¶

Initialize list of nodes for forward search

Parameters

  • node_list (List[Node]) – list of nodes at time step t

  • acc_vehicle_param (Dict[~KT, ~VT]) – dictionary with physical parameters of the ACC vehicle

  • dt (float) – time step size [s]

Return type

List[State]

Returns

list of acc states at time step t-1

backward_search.check_unsafe_node_reached(node, simulation_param, rrt_param, lead_vehicle_param, acc_vehicle_param, acc_planner)[source]¶

Evaluate if unsafe node is reached after forward simulation and if goal node is valid

Parameters

  • node (Node) – starting node for forward simulation

  • simulation_param (Dict[~KT, ~VT]) – dictionary with parameters of the simulation environment

  • rrt_param (Dict[~KT, ~VT]) – rrt_param: dictionary with RRT parameters

  • lead_vehicle_param (Dict[~KT, ~VT]) – dictionary with physical parameters of the lead vehicle

  • acc_vehicle_param (Dict[~KT, ~VT]) – dictionary with physical parameters of the ACC vehicle

  • acc_planner (AccFactory) – ACC planning algorithm

Return type

Tuple[bool, bool]

Returns

valid unsafe node, initial safe node

backward_search.init_nodes_backward(acc_vehicle_param, lead_vehicle_param, simulation_param, rrt_param)[source]¶

Evaluate if unsafe node is reached after forward simulation and if goal node is valid

Parameters

  • acc_vehicle_param (Dict[~KT, ~VT]) – dictionary with physical parameters of the ACC vehicle

  • lead_vehicle_param (Dict[~KT, ~VT]) – dictionary with physical parameters of the lead vehicle

  • simulation_param (Dict[~KT, ~VT]) – dictionary with parameters of the simulation environment

  • rrt_param (Dict[~KT, ~VT]) – dictionary with RRT parameters

Return type

List[Node]

Returns

list of new nodes

backward_search.search(rrt_param, acc_vehicle_param, simulation_param, lead_vehicle_param, acc_param, acc_param_all_controllers)[source]¶

Backward search using RRT

Parameters

  • rrt_param (Dict[~KT, ~VT]) – dictionary with RRT parameters

  • acc_vehicle_param (Dict[~KT, ~VT]) – dictionary with physical parameters of the ACC vehicle

  • simulation_param (Dict[~KT, ~VT]) – dictionary with parameters of the simulation environment

  • lead_vehicle_param (Dict[~KT, ~VT]) – dictionary with physical parameters of the leading vehicle

  • acc_param (Dict[~KT, ~VT]) – dictionary with parameters of selected ACC controller

  • acc_param_all_controllers (Dict[~KT, ~VT]) – dictionary with parameter dictionaries for each ACC controller
